articles.author: Antoine Gara
articles.title: Silver Lake set to take over software company Qualtrics in $12.5bn deal - Financial Times
articles.description: Buyout with Canada’s largest pension fund is expected to be one of biggest this year
articles.content:
US private equity group Silver Lake has agreed to buy Qualtrics for $12.5bn alongside Canadas largest pension fund.
The takeover is expected to be announced on Monday morning, according to sources f… [+2870 chars]
